rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample space for seating and decoration in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open-plan living area with large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation. Features minimalistic decor and a seamless connection to the kitchen.
Dining space adjacent to the living area, with access to both indoor and outdoor light for an airy feel.
Efficient, minimalist kitchen design emphasizing natural lighting from large windows. Counters aligned per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with south-facing orientation to maximize sunlight while ensuring privacy and tranquility.
Guest or child's bedroom designed to enhance natural ventilation and light.
Additional bedroom adhering to minimalist design and Vastu principles for balanced energy flow.
Dedicated home theater area with soundproof walls. Utilizes ambient lighting and ventilation to maintain a comfortable environment.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom, designed with efficient natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large entrance door with sliding mechanism to allow ample natural light and cross ventilation, aligned per Vastu guidelines.
Large window facing east to maximize morning sunlight in the living area.
Window on the south side for balanced lighting.
Kitchen window positioned to ensure natural ventilation and light in the cooking space.
South-facing window for the master bedroom ensuring proper sunlight exposure.
